channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Avaya Experience Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Avaya Experience Portal

item.title: CVE-2021-25655|2024-08-03T20:11:27.870Z -- avaya -- avaya%20experience%20portal
item.description: A vulnerability in the system Service Menu component of Avaya Aura Experience Portal may allow URL Redirection to any untrusted site through a crafted attack. Affected versions include 7.0 through 7.2.3 (without hotfix) and 8.0.0 (without hotfix).
